name: Space Ranger Ribbet
description:
Space Ranger Ribbet is a game where you take control of an Amphibian Space Ranger called Ribbet.

Ribbet crash lands on the strange planet of Yutani and embarks on an adventure to navigate its dangerous obstacles using the futuristic tools and his frog abilities in order to recover parts of his trusty ship, The Oryx. 

Collect four missing parts scattered across the planet and explore the widely diverse ecosystem to ultimately repair your ship and escape the planet.


CONTRIBUTORS:
